meta_title: To'rabek Raufov - Frontend Developer & Startup Enthusiast | T6rabek
meta_description: To'rabek Raufov (Torabek, T6rabek) - 19-year-old Frontend Developer from Samarkand, Uzbekistan. Building real solutions: TourFixer.uz, txielts.uz. Expert in React, Next.js, tourism. Contact me for web development projects.
hero_bio: I'm a 19-year-old university student from Samarkand, Uzbekistan. I build projects that solve real problems — tools and platforms people actually need.
about_intro: Hey! I'm To'rabek, a 19-year-old boy. I'm passionate about solving real life problems through technology. Studying and getting experience in tourism organization and management. I am a frontend developer.
about_story: I don't just code for the sake of coding — I build things that people actually need. Whether it's a tourism platform to help travelers explore Uzbekistan, a free IELTS prep tool for students, or a Telegram bot to make studying easier, I focus on solving real problems.
about_highlight_location: Based in Samarkand, the heart of the Silk Road
about_highlight_passion: Startup enthusiast focused on impactful solutions
projects_subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've built to solve real problems
project_tourfixer_desc: A tourism platform I built to organize tours in Uzbekistan for foreign guests. Connecting travelers with authentic local experiences.
project_txielts_desc: A free platform for students to take IELTS mock tests. Helping thousands of Uzbek students prepare for their English exams.
project_quizzuz_desc: A Telegram bot alternative to Quizlet for easy studying. Making flashcard learning accessible right in Telegram.
skills_subtitle: I wear multiple hats — here's what I bring to the table
contact_subtitle: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations
contact_cta_text: Have a project in mind? Let's talk!
